question: Which state government recently signed a memorandum of understanding with HDFC Bank, to strengthen its start-ups?
explanation:
The state government of Odisha recently signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with HDFC Bank, to strengthen its start-ups.
Under the agreement signed between the Micro Small & Medium Enterprises (MSME) department of Odisha and the bank, HDFC would lend incubation support to the start-up units of the state, so that they are able to show-case their products to various stakeholders.
